Well Barry,
                      It's obvious that God loves all his children, even the
stupid ones.   It's allowing them to breed that bothers me!

Mark

  -----Original Message-----
  From: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com [mailto:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com]On
Behalf Of Barry Thomas
  Sent: Friday, September 09, 2005 8:55 AM
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Re: Tsuba care question


  I know a man who has been known to "touch up" faded silk lacing on armour
with
  those fluoroescent marker pens....  Oh, and reducing a good shakudo habaki
on a
  yoroi doshi to bright copper.  Why does God allow such people to
breathe????

  Barry (Justice for Swords) Thomas.

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: "alchemyst" <alchemyst@...>

  > Yeah, works well, just like a black permanent marker for "fixing up"
  > shakudo rubs!  Hahahaha!
  >
  > NC  ;o)

  Actually for iron, stripping to bare metal with
  a power wire wheel and the throw it on the bar-bee
  and bast with motor oil. :-)

  Rich
